solution_line_template: Olaf is {beckett_age} years + {olaf_younger_by} years = <<{beckett_age}+{olaf_younger_by}={olaf_age}>>{olaf_age} years old.
Shannen is {olaf_age} years old - {shannen_younger_by} years = <<{olaf_age}-{shannen_younger_by}={shannen_age}>>{shannen_age} years old.
Jack is {jack_base} years + ({jack_multiplier} * {shannen_age} years) = <<{jack_base}+({jack_multiplier}*{shannen_age})={jack_age}>>{jack_age} years old.
The sum of all of their ages is {beckett_age} + {olaf_age} + {shannen_age} + {jack_age} = <<{beckett_age}+{olaf_age}+{shannen_age}+{jack_age}={total_age}>>{total_age} years old.
